text: Flicka 2 is a 2010 American drama film and a sequel to Flicka (2006). The film is about a city girl who finds herself in the country not by choice and befriends an Equus. Neither girl or equuid are wanted and they find a common bond. The film stars Patrick Warburton, Tammin Sursok and Clint Black. title: Flicka 2
